TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X500DistinguishedName extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData
Public NotInheritable Class X500DistinguishedName Inherits AsnEncodedData

Attribute.AttributeName: System.MonoTODO("Some X500DistinguishedNameFlags options aren't supported, like DoNotUsePlusSign, DoNotUseQuotes and ForceUTF8Encoding")

summary.span: 代表 X509 憑證的辨別名稱。

span.span: Represents the distinguished name of an X509 certificate.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別就像的延伸模組或屬性，這是個人或憑證發行至的實體的名稱。This class is like an extension to the or property, which is the name of the person or entity that the certificate is being issued to. X.500 是國際標準分散式的目錄服務。X.500 is an international standard for distributed directory services. 辨別的名稱使用下列格式：The distinguished name uses the following format: [X500:/C=CountryCode/O=Organization/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=CommonName][X500:/C=CountryCode/O=Organization/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=CommonName] 適用於下列欄位長度限制：The following field length limits apply: |欄位Field|長度限制Length Limit| |-----------|------------------| |國碼CountryCode|2 個字元2 characters| |組織Organization|最多 64 個字元Up to 64 characters| |OrganizationUnitOrganizationUnit|最多 32 個字元Up to 32 characters| |CommonNameCommonName|最多 64 個字元Up to 64 characters| 以下是適用的方針：The following guidelines apply: - 欄位值可以是大寫或小寫。Field values can be uppercase or lowercase. - 分隔符號是斜線 （/），而且必須出現的第一個值之前或後續的值之間。Delimiters are slash marks (/) and must appear before the first value and between subsequent values. - 分隔符號後面可以接著一個空格。Delimiters can be followed by a space. 以下是格式正確的名稱的範例: [X500: /C = US / O = Microsoft / OU = WGA / CN = TedSt]The following is an example of a correctly formatted name: [X500:/ C=US/ O=Microsoft/ OU=WGA/ CN=TedSt] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName/CPP/x500.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName/CS/x500.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName/VB/x500.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將 ASN 編碼的辨別的名稱解碼成字串值。This method decodes the ASN encoded distinguished name into a string value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. summary.span: 傳回 X500 辨別名稱的格式化版本，用於列印或輸出至文字視窗或主控台 (Console)。

span.span: Returns a formatted version of an X500 distinguished name for printing or for output to a text window or to a console.

returns.span: 格式化字串，表示 X500 辨別名稱。

span.span: A formatted string that represents the X500 distinguished name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來列印抽象語法標記法數字 One (ASN.1)-編碼的資料或資訊輸出到文字方塊中。Use this method to print Abstract Syntax Notation number One (ASN.1)-encoded data or output the information to a text box. 使用`multiLine`參數來控制輸出的版面配置。Use the `multiLine` parameter to control the layout of the output. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. summary.span: 從 X500 憑證取得逗號分隔的辨別名稱。

span.span: Gets the comma-delimited distinguished name from an X500 certificate.

value.span: X509 憑證的逗號分隔辨別名稱。

span.span: The comma-delimited distinguished name of the X509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辨別的名稱使用下列格式：The distinguished name uses the following format: [X500:/C=CountryCode/O=Organization/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=CommonName][X500:/C=CountryCode/O=Organization/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=CommonName] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class.
